Name: A Polish Electroencephalography, Alzheimer’s Risk-genes, Lifestyle and Neuroimaging (PEARL-Neuro) Database
HowToAcknowledge: Dzianok P, Kublik E. PEARL-Neuro Database: EEG, fMRI, health and lifestyle data of middle-aged people at risk of dementia. Sci Data 11, 276 (2024). DOI: https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-03106-5
Funding: Polish National Science Center (NCN) grant no. 2018/31/N/HS6/03551
EthicsApprovals: This study was approved by the Bioethics Committee of the Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń at the Ludwik Rydygier Collegium Medicum in Bydgoszcz, Poland (KB 684/2019)
